title: I sent riot a supp ticket but 3 days later still nothing wtf

replies.body:
We definitely don't hate you, and we certainly don't want to leave you behind. We've had a lot of players ask for help lately, and since we have to help everyone equally, we're doing our best to get to everyone. Our specialists are all working their butts off, so if you remain patient, we'll get to you as soon as we can!

Let me know if you have any questions.
I'm really sry for my rudeness, I'm just really scared that my account isn't able to be fixed
